review.title: “nice company”
review.pros: Pros – Good pay, Work life balance, over all good and pleasure to work
review.cons: Cons – I havenot found out any cons but interview process could be better
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
